content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price. I will start with the price of 1000 Euro per month. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking for something a bit more affordable. Would you consider 950 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I can't go that low. I'll meet you in the middle at 975 Euro per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 975 Euro per month is a bit high for me, considering the apartment is unfurnished. Could we perhaps discuss a lower price? How about 925 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I can't go that low. This is a prime location and a newly built apartment. I'll meet you halfway at 950 Euro per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 950 Euro per month is more reasonable. I agree to the price of 950 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
